text:
I believe this is a bug in RowRecordAggregate.
The bug resides in the fact that when asked to "getRow(rowNum)"  the comparison
in the HashMap is made by Objects comparison instead of row numbers comparison.

Greetz
Tal
creator: talm@vistaportal.com
talm@vistaportal.com

text:
Glen, as I understand it you had concerns with this patch?  Have they been resolved?

Tal, is this patch against 1.5 or against the head?  Are you intending for it to
be applied and appear in 2.0 or a possible later 1.5 bugfix release? 

Once I get confirmation from you gentlemen on these issues I'll apply and commit.

Thanks,

Andy

text:

comparator.
